Welcome!
This asset contains 2 packages. Please use the appropriate package according to the rendering pipeline of your project:

** Builtin Pipeline **

 Minimum Unity version: 2017.4 or later.
 Import package from /BuiltIn folder and add Beautify script to your camera. That's all!

 IMPORTANT: always read PDF documentation for detailed instructions.


** LWRP or URP Pipelines **

 Minimum Unity version: 2018.3 (LWRP) or 2019.3 (URP).
 Import package from /PPSv2 folder and follow the instructions in the PDF manual.

 Note: demo scene in PPSv2 version is designed for built-in pipeline.
 If you're using Universal Rendering Pipeline, use the option menu Edit -> Universal Rendering Pipeline -> Upgrade Project Materials for UniversalRP Materials.

 IMPORTANT: always read PDF documentation for detailed instructions.


Questions / Suggestions / Support
